It was Mr. Joestar and Jotaro who tended the wounds on my head and back in India.
I also had Avdol do a little shopping for me.
From here, we will ride to Egypt in this!
You really bought something like this?!
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
it is the most beautiful sea in the world.
The east and west shores are both red deserts,
which is why it is known as the Red Sea.
There are no cities nearby to pollute it,
nor rivers that flow into it.
Hey, can you drive this thing, Avdol?
You are not driving this thing.
I am not letting you crash us again.
This is my first time in one,
but it is not as cramped as I expected.
This is a vessel that the rich use to explore the sea floor for pleasure.
As you see, it even has windows.
I have always kind of liked this sort of thing.
I wish I could have ridden it with a cute girl...
I see you have not changed, Polnareff.
We did not come here to play.
to detect things underwater, a bit like radar.
With this, we can detect anyone trying to attack us, from any direction.
But if we were to be attacked in here, we would have nowhere to run.
We are 60 meters below sea level, after all.
I guess this is to be expected of pleasure cruiser for the wealthy.
Not to mention the latest satellite phones.
Everyone, be quiet for a moment.
I am going to make a phone call.
It must be very important, if you are calling from here.
Yes, it is an important and delicate matter.
The sparkly design is more to my liking,
but it is for the charity event tomorrow.
Maybe a refreshing white would be better...
They both look lovely on you, Madam.
By the way, where are you?
It is a bit hard to hear you.
R-Right... I am at a hotel.
I am sorry, but I do not think I will be
back any time soon, because of work.
Traveling on business to another country right after going to Japan...
It is been nearly a month now, has not it?
Yes, I just spoke to her on the phone yesterday.
that is developed into a bit of pneumonia.
She says it is not serious, but I am thinking about going to visit her.
There is no need for that.
I am sure she will recover quickly.
Madam Joestar is full of vitality,
Yes, I will check up on that myself.
so he needs to check in now and then
to make sure she does not visit Miss Holly in Japan, and discover the truth.
Of course, she has not been told anything.
There is no need to worry her.
There is nothing to worry about.
I will hold off on going to Japan.
By the way, Joseph, I have something I would like to ask you.
I am trying to decide between a white dress and a purple one...
Hey, Suzie, could you let me talk to Rosas?
Have you considered your blue dress?
It should be in the back of the closet.
I will go take a look.
Hello, it is me, Master Joseph.
There is no chance of her overhearing us now.
Actually, right now, I am calling you from the submarine that I spoke of.
So you were safely able to meet up with Master Avdol?
Have you gotten hold of the doctors from the Speedwagon Foundation?
Miss Holly says on the phone that she only has a cold.
But her condition worsens by the day.
Perhaps we should tell Madam Joestar the truth.
There is no need for that.
We will end all of this very soon.
It is best if she can just go back to her daily routine.
Do not let Suzie know anything under any circumstances.
I pray for your safe return.
Oh, Rosas, did you already hang up?
I was not done talking to him!
You will have some, too, will not you, Rosas?
I shall serve you the tea.
You have my condolences, Mr. Joestar.
Egypt's right in front of us.
We must defeat Dio as soon as possible and save Miss Holly.
That is exactly why I have returned.
I guess it is no wonder you can drive it, Avdol.
There are many obstacles in the sea.
Let us speed up just a little bi
Oh, there are exactly five cups.
Hurry up and make some coffee.
I can see the coast of Africa.
Near this coral reef, there is an underwater tunnel formed by erosion.
So, we have finally made it to Egypt.
Nah, I am just really happy.
It is been a while since all five of us were last together.
Why did you bring six cups?
I guess I was not paying attention.
I could have sworn it was five...
At some point, a Stand got into the submarine!
It turned into one of the gauges!
Just as it turned into a coffee cup!
We are at the coral reef!
We were only a few hundred meters from surfacing in Egypt!
Mr. Joestar is unconscious, but his wounds are not deep.
It was just his artificial hand.
Who is it at a time like this?
The enemy is using the Stand that suggests The High Priestess.
The name of the the Stand user is Rose.
It is a Stand that can be controlled from far away,
so the user is probably on the surface.
It can turn into anything that is metal or glass,
as long as it is a mineral.
So that includes plastic and vinyl, as well.
Even if we touch it or hit it,
unless it attacks, we have no way of recognizing it.
B-But where did it sneak in here from?
So it cut a hole and came in?
We are suddenly low on oxygen.
Who the hell is it at a time like this?
Do not touch things without thinki
I was not done talking to you, so I made Rosas give me the number.
Not to mention, what a rowdy hotel you are in.
I hear something like... a siren?
Sorry, but the old man cannot come to the phone right now.
Why are you with your grandfather?
There is nothing to worry about, Grandma Suzie.
Once things calm down, we will call you back.
We are going to hit the sea floor!
Every vehicle we ride in gets destroyed!
I am never getting in a submarine again.
I could get through until a moment ago.
It seems as though the line is dead.
H-Hey, the oxygen's getting thin in here.
Did you see which gauge the Stand turned into?
It looked like it turned into this one.
It is become part of the hull's surface and started moving.
If we stay in this room, we will all get badly hurt.
Everyone, head to the next room!
We will seal this room and trap it inside!
I-It already moved and transformed into the door wheel...
I-I have to take my hands off!
Its nails tore off Mr. Joestar's artificial hand...
Apparently, it cannot move faster than Star Platinum.
What should we do with it?
Hurry up and rip its head off.
I cannot believe it landed an attack on Jotaro.
I am not sure what is happening,
but are we in a pinch?
If we touch it, we will get attacked.
So, we just need to not touch it!
We should strike while it is visible.
Th-There is still oxygen over here.
But it is just a matter of time.
We are sinking, so we need to trap that thing!
We will figure out how to fight it then!
I, Jotaro Kujo, will end you myself.
Jotaro, you answered a phone call from Suzie?
You should not have done that.
Anyway, we will talk when we get out of this predicament.
I, Joseph Joestar, have been in a number of situations like this.
I was happy to hear that boy's voice after so long.
I heard he is become rather wild lately,
but deep down, he is a sweet child who cares very much for his family.
I am sure he is helping Joseph out in many ways.
are most likely fighting a common enemy together right now.
To save Miss Holly, someone very dear to them, from the evil curse.
I am not sure if it is us or the Stand that is trapped.
Sooner or later, it will cut its way out of that room and get here!
We are definitely at a disadvantage in this closed space filled with machines.
We need to abandon it and escape!
We just need to surface in Egypt!
But we are 40 meters below sea level!
It is not that deep, but how are we going to get to the surface?
I have never done this before...
But I cannot make the necessary preparations to dive with this hand.
First of all, make sure not to panic.
The ocean floor is so beautiful...
If it is okay, you will do this...
If we are in trouble, do this.
I think I would like to see your face sometime.
